data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 2
data.actual_result: The prune button is always visible and creates an entry for the audit log with 0 kicked members.
data.expected_result: The prune button should be deactivated when there are no members that can be kicked.
data.short_description: Prune members option always activated/visible although no members can be kicked
data.steps_to_repro: - Open your server settings - Go to members - Click on the 3 dots in top right corner - Select the prune option - Choose any time that would kick 0 members - Observe the prune button
